topic.title: /stats missing?
topic.body: I seem to have lost the ability to hit up http://127.0.0.1:43110/stats where I can see current connections, etc. Did the URL change in recent builds or am I remembering that site URL wrong?

1_134tqSwDpKTdoPABqGskg1YMNptAxfu3Lh.body: hi there - this seems like a cool idea, but why not just use Ricochet or BitMessage? Genuinely curious :)
